reference.title: javaPackage
reference.shortdesc: The <javaPackage> element provides the name of the Java API package and all the elements necessary to describe the package, or set of packages, and its components.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <javaPackage> element requires an ID attribute as an anchor point. This ID is the target for references by <link> or <xref> elements (conref attribute), and for other internal specialization elements that refer to this content. Use a unique key such as fully qualified package name for the named API reference. The <apiName>, <shortdesc>, <javaPackageDetail>, and <apiDesc> elements are required for this top-level container.
